title: The Badger City Gang
description: [Siren Menage Erotic Western Menage a Quatre Romance, M/F/M/M, HEA] Craving the respect given to ranch owners, the three McInnes men will do anything to gain the Running W. Five years of long hours will pay off the debt to Walt and prove they’re nothing like their uncle, the Badger City Gang leader. Desperate for a wife, Zach uses his uncle’s skills to kidnap a willing woman from the Bride Train. Kate Mason’s almost more than they can handle, full of adventure and a wild spirit. But, after their mother’s deceit, can they trust Kate’s words? Kate wants Zach, Rusty, and Gideon, in bed and out, but insists on a husband accepting her as she is while loving her deeply. If not, she’ll keep her freedom. Then Walt offers them a devil’s bargain—his wealthy daughter and the ranch free and clear, or take Kate and leave Tanner’s Ford forever. Will they choose the woman they love, or the ranch and respectability? There is no sexual relationship or touching for titillation between or among siblings. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Reece Butler
